column1: NGR is from the 1950s record and is at Sudbrook, close to the pumping station for the Severn Railway Tunnel; the observer for the later records was British Railways. Altitudes match
Aug 1890 the gauge wwas moved 240 yards east and the reading is in brackets but has been left in ths record. Note the terrain is flat in this area.
The 1950s record implies the gauge may have been moved in the 1950s but no details are given, but the move is probably not significant
